backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a UI contrast update request to the YearlySummaryTable component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/DEVELOPMENT.md: Development guide outlining prerequisites and local setup steps for the project.
frontend/env.json: Environment configuration providing the Internet Identity URL.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color variables, themes, and base styling for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads fonts and mounts the React application.
frontend/README.md: Project overview describing features of the Goals Dashboard app and linking to development docs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the GoalsDashboard and global Toaster.
frontend/src/components/CenteredNotifica: Centered auto-dismissing notification component rendered above modals.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyCompletio: Large modal handling camera-based or uploaded monthly memory images with capture, processing, and save logic.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyMemorySha: Dropdown providing sharing and download actions for monthly memory images.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyProgressD: SVG donut indicator showing monthly progress as a circular chart.
frontend/src/components/MonthSelectionMo: Modal for selecting a single month with confirm and cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/YearlySummaryTab: Renders a yearly summary table of completed goals by month, manages checkbox UI state, celebration modals, and monthly memory data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
Enhances the base camera hook with preview readiness tracking, event listeners, and utilities for capture and camera switching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing because no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme variables, component styles, and custom utilities including styling for summary table checkboxes.
frontend/src/lib/celebrationImageComposi: Generates a composited celebration image by combining a selfie with a Polaroid frame and overlay badge, plus utilities for loading images and converting files.
frontend/src/lib/monthlyMemoryShare.ts: Provides utilities to share monthly memory images via Web Share API with fallbacks for downloading and social media links.
frontend/src/lib/monthlyMemoryStorage.ts: Handles saving, retrieving, and clearing monthly memory images in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/months.ts: Defines the list of month names and a Month type.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/GoalsDashboard.tsx: Implements a goals dashboard UI with categorized goal cards and month assignment features.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related build settings referencing vite config.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, environment variables, aliases, and API proxying.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, issues, and pending requests.
